df-wina
blocks.content: An ordinal is weakly inaccessible iff it is a regular limit cardinal. Note that our definition allows ` _om ` as a weakly inaccessible cardinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: df-ina
blocks.content: An ordinal is strongly inaccessible iff it is a regular strong limit cardinal, which is to say that it dominates the powersets of every smaller ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: elwina
blocks.content: Conditions of weak inaccessibility. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elwina(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cwina), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cwina), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cwina)
  3ad2ant2(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbii(wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cfv(ccf, c0), universe))
  fvex(ccf, c0)
  eleq1(cfv(ccf, c0), c0, universe)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cwina, w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))), w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))), wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls)
  mpancom(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0)), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccf, c0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccf)
  eqeq12(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccf, c0), cv(hs0), c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))
  rexeq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))
  df-wina(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elwina(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà InaccW ‚Üî(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(cf ` c0)= c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà InaccW, (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(cf ` c0)= c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, cwina)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (cf ` c0)= c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1)), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  mpbii((cf ` c0)= c0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (cf ` c0)‚àà ùïå)
  fvex(ccf, c0)
  eleq1((cf ` c0), c0, universe)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cwina, (c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(cf ` c0)= c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))), (hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(cf ` hs0)= hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0[‚â∫]s1))))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (cf ` hs0)= hs0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0[‚â∫]s1)), c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ, (cf ` c0)= c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1)))
  neeq1(hs0, c0, emptycls)
  mpancom(hs0 = c0, ((cf ` hs0)= hs0 ‚Üî(cf ` c0)= c0), (cf ` hs0)=(cf ` c0))
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccf)
  eqeq12((cf ` hs0), (cf ` c0), hs0, c0)
  raleqbi1dv(s0, hs0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà hs0, s0[‚â∫]s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))
  rexeq(s1, hs0, c0, s0[‚â∫]s1)
  df-wina(hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß(cf ` c0)= c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: winaon
blocks.content: A weakly inaccessible cardinal is an ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2014.)

blocks.name: inawinalem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ inawina . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm inawinalem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, con0), wi(wral(s0, c0, wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  ralimdv(s0, c0, wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))
  ex(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))
  mpd(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))), wrex(s1, con0, wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0), wrex(s1, con0, wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0)))), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), cdom, c0))
  sdomdom(cpw(cv(s0)), c0)
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), cdom, c0)), wrex(s1, con0, wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0)))), wcel(cpw(cv(s0)), cdm(ccrd)))
  ondomen(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  isnum2(s1, cpw(cv(s0)))
  reximdv2(s1, con0, c0, wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0)), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))
  expcom(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1))))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0), wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0))
  ensdomtr(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s0)), c0)
  ad2ant2r(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0))), wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0), wi(wbr(cv(s1), csdm, c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  sdomel(cv(s1), c0)
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0)), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)))
  sylancr(wbr(cv(s1), cen, cpw(cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), csdm, cpw(cv(s0))), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), cen, cv(s1)))
  canth2(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  ensym(cv(s1), cpw(cv(s0)))
  sdomentr(cv(s0), cpw(cv(s0)), cv(s1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, con0), wbr(cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cpw(cv(s0)), csdm, c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.csdm.s(s1)
}

thm inawinalem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà On ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0)‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  ralimdv(s0, c0, c0 ‚àà On, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))
  ex(c0 ‚àà On, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1))
  mpd((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚â∫]c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà On, s1[‚âÖ]P(s0)))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà On, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà On, s1[‚âÖ]P(s0)), P(s0)[‚âº]c0)
  sdomdom(P(s0), c0)
  sylib((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚âº]c0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà On, s1[‚âÖ]P(s0)), P(s0)‚àà dom(card))
  ondomen(c0, P(s0))
  isnum2(s1, P(s0))
  reximdv2(s1, con0, c0, (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚â∫]c0), s1[‚âÖ]P(s0), s0[‚â∫]s1)
  expcom((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚â∫]c0), (s1 ‚àà On ‚àß s1[‚âÖ]P(s0)), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0[‚â∫]s1))
  jca(((s1 ‚àà On ‚àß s1[‚âÖ]P(s0))‚àß(c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚â∫]c0)), s1 ‚àà c0, s0[‚â∫]s1)
  mpd(((s1 ‚àà On ‚àß s1[‚âÖ]P(s0))‚àß(c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚â∫]c0)), s1 ‚àà c0, s1[‚â∫]c0)
  ad2ant2l(s1 ‚àà On, s1[‚âÖ]P(s0), c0 ‚àà On, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0, s1[‚â∫]c0)
  ensdomtr(s1, P(s0), c0)
  ad2ant2r(s1 ‚àà On, s1[‚âÖ]P(s0), c0 ‚àà On, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0, (s1[‚â∫]c0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà c0))
  sdomel(s1, c0)
  ad2antlr(s1 ‚àà On, s1[‚âÖ]P(s0), (c0 ‚àà On ‚àß P(s0)[‚â∫]c0), s0[‚â∫]s1)
  sylancr(s1[‚âÖ]P(s0), s0[‚â∫]s1, s0[‚â∫]P(s0), P(s0)[‚âÖ]s1)
  canth2(s0)
  vex(s0)
  ensym(s1, P(s0))
  sdomentr(s0, P(s0), s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ‚àà On, P(s0)[‚â∫]c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, con0)
  diff.con0.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, P(s0), csdm, c0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)

blocks.name: inawina
blocks.content: Every strongly inaccessible cardinal is weakly inaccessible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm inawina(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cina), wcel(c0, cwina))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, cina), wcel(c0, cwina), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), csdm, c0))), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), csdm, cv(hs1))))))
  mpcom(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), csdm, c0))), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), csdm, cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, con0))
  3ad2ant2(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wbr(cpw(cv(hs0)), csdm, c0)), wcel(c0, con0))
  mpbii(wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wcel(c0, con0), wcel(cfv(ccf, c0), con0))

blocks.name: winalim
blocks.content: A weakly inaccessible cardinal is a limit ordinal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2014.)

blocks.name: winafp
blocks.content: A nontrivial weakly inaccessible cardinal is a fixed point of the aleph function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm winafp(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wceq(cfv(cale, c0), c0))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wceq(cfv(cale, c0), c0), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0))))
  winalim2(hs0, c0)
  eqtr3d(cfv(cale, c0), c0, cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(cale, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  eqssd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  sseqtrd(cv(hs0), c0, cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cale, cv(hs0))))
  syl(wlim(cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cale, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), con0))
  mpan(wlim(cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), con0), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  limelon(cv(hs0), universe)
  alephle(cv(hs0))
  syl6eqssr(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  eqtr3d(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(ccf, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  eqtr3d(cfv(ccf, c0), cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  fveq2d(ccf, cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))))
  ad2antll(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(ccf, cfv(cale, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccf, cv(hs0))))
  alephsing(cv(hs0))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com), wa(wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0))
  simp2bi(wcel(c0, cwina), wceq(cfv(ccf, c0), c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c0, wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cv(hs2)))))
  elwina(hs1, hs2, c0)
  cfle(cv(hs0))
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)), wceq(cfv(cale, cv(hs0)), c0), wlim(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cwina), wne(c0, com)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(cale, c0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: winafpi
blocks.content: This theorem, which states that a nontrivial inaccessible cardinal is its own aleph number, is stated here in inference form, where the assumptions are in the hypotheses rather than an antecedent. Often, we use ~ dedth to turn this type of statement into the closed form statement ~ winafp , but in this case, since it is consistent with ZFC that there are no nontrivial inaccessible cardinals, it is not possible to prove ~ winafp using this theorem and ~ dedth , in ZFC. (You can prove this if you use ~ ax-groth , though.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2014.)

blocks.name: gchina
blocks.content: Assuming the GCH, weakly and strongly inaccessible cardinals coincide. Theorem 11.20 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 106. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gchina() {
  |- wi(wceq(cgch, universe), wceq(cwina, cina))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cwina, cina, wceq(cgch, universe))
  impbid1(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina), wcel(cv(hs0), cina))
  ex(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina), wcel(cv(hs0), cina))
  mpd(wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wcel(cv(hs0), cina), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina))
  simpr(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina))
  3imtr4g(wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina), wcel(cv(hs0), cina), w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cv(hs2))))), w3a(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wbr(cpw(cv(hs1)), csdm, cv(hs0)))))
  3anim123d(wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cv(hs2)))), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wral(hs1, cv(hs0), wbr(cpw(cv(hs1)), csdm, cv(hs0))))
  idd(wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wne(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  idd(wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wceq(cfv(ccf, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  ralimdva(hs1, cv(hs0), wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wrex(hs2, cv(hs0), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cv(hs2))), wbr(cpw(cv(hs1)), csdm, cv(hs0)))
  rexlimdva(hs2, cv(hs0), wa(wa(wceq(cgch, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cwina)), wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs1), csdm, cv(hs2)), wbr(cpw(cv(hs1)), csdm, cv(hs0)))
